scripts.build: npm run-script geojson-trips; npm run-script geojson-all
scripts.geojson-trips: for filename in trips/*.md; do trip=$(basename $filename | cut -d '.' -f1); files="$(grep "^categories:.*$trip" _posts/*.md | uniq | tr '.' '-' | cut -d '-' -f4 | sed 's/\(.*\)/destinations\/\1.geojson/')"; args=''; while read -r file; do [[ -r "$file" ]] && args="$args $file"; done <<< "$files"; if [ ! -z "$args" ]; then geojson-merge $args >| dist/$trip.geojson; fi; done
